catalogue.title: The 24/7 City Hall: Automating Citizen Service Requests
catalogue.miniDescription: Build an AI assistant that allows citizens to report non-emergency issues like potholes or broken streetlights instantly, any time of day.

catalogue.title: Cut the Red Tape: Automating Permit Applications and Status Checks
catalogue.miniDescription: Build a digital permitting assistant that streamlines the entire lifecycle, from a guided application to on-demand status checks.

catalogue.title: From Backlog to Breakthrough: Automating FOIA Request Management
catalogue.miniDescription: Streamline the entire Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) lifecycle, from a structured intake portal to automated deadline tracking and task assignment.

catalogue.title: The Digital Advisor: An AI-Powered Policy Bot for Civil Servants
catalogue.miniDescription: Build an AI-powered Copilot that provides civil servants with instant, accurate, and consistent answers to any internal policy question.

catalogue.title: Reclaim Your Time: AI-Powered Summarization for Public Meeting Minutes
catalogue.miniDescription: Use AI to listen to a public meeting recording and generate a high-quality draft of the minutes in a fraction of the time.

catalogue.title: Citizen Service Request Intake
catalogue.miniDescription: Build a '311-style' digital assistant that allows citizens to report issues 24/7, which are then intelligently routed to the correct municipal department for action.

catalogue.title: Permit Application Processing
catalogue.miniDescription: Digitize the entire permit application and approval workflow, providing a better experience for citizens and greater efficiency for the government agency.

catalogue.title: Public Records Request (FOIA) Management
catalogue.miniDescription: Manage the FOIA request lifecycle from intake to delivery, ensuring compliance and reducing administrative burden.

catalogue.title: Public Meeting Scheduling & Minutes Distribution
catalogue.miniDescription: Automate the entire communication and documentation workflow for public meetings.

catalogue.title: Employee Benefits & Policy Questions
catalogue.miniDescription: Provide a self-service tool for employees to get instant, accurate answers to questions about benefits, policies, and procedures.

catalogue.title: New Employee Onboarding
catalogue.miniDescription: Automate and orchestrate the entire onboarding checklist to ensure a seamless day-one experience for every new hire.
